featured.text: The fourth week, the man said he had not yet received his 36 from the government and gave them only 10 rupees.
“You expect us to play seven days a week for 40 five rupees!”
At the end of the first two weeks, the boys came to the old man’s house, and went away 34 with their 25 rupees.
He would therefore give them 25 rupees each week to play in the street at night.

other.text: The third week when they came back, however, the old man said he had 35 money and sent them away with only 15 rupees.
He apologized that he could not afford to pay them 25 rupees as he had 39 , but said he would give them five rupees each week without fail.

definition.zh_def: 盧比：多個國家的貨幣單位，特別是在印度、巴基斯坦和尼泊爾等地使用。
definition.en_def: Rupee: The currency unit of several countries, particularly used in India, Pakistan, and Nepal.
definition.example: I exchanged my dollars for rupees before traveling to India.
